# Results Outputs

This folder contains CSV and text files generated by running the Jupyter notebooks.

## Files Generated by Notebooks

### Data Exploration (Notebook 01)
- `data_summary.csv` - Overview statistics of the dataset

### Probabilistic CLV (Notebook 02)
- `clv_model_summary.csv` - BG/NBD and Gamma-Gamma model parameters

### Feature Engineering (Notebook 03)
- `feature_importance.csv` - Feature correlation with churn
- `feature_summary.csv` - Statistical summary of all 30 features

### Churn Modeling (Notebook 04)
- `model_comparison.csv` - 6-model benchmark results
- `model_feature_importance.csv` - Random Forest feature importance
- `churn_modeling_summary.csv` - Final model summary

### Enhanced Modeling (Notebook 04.1 - Experimental)
- `enhanced_model_comparison.csv` - SMOTE experiment results (failed)

### Explainability (Notebook 05)
- `shap_feature_importance.csv` - SHAP-based feature rankings

### Business Strategy (Notebook 06)
- `customer_segments_actionable.csv` - CRM-ready customer list with segments
- `risk_value_segments.csv` - 4-quadrant segmentation summary
- `executive_summary.txt` - Marketing Director briefing

---

**Note:** These files are regenerated each time you run the notebooks. 
To reproduce these results, run notebooks 01-06 in sequential order.
